name: Dual Soul
description: You are an undead bounty hunter awoken for your slumber to destroy fallen angels and demons to allow life to flourish again. This game is a "Boss rush" that will test your skills, and if you can eliminate all the shattered souls, you will have a chance to fight the Death King to restore life. As an undead bounty hunter you are bestowed with the power of light and dark. Specific enemies will require a different approach from both sides of the divine/ evil spectrum. If you are lucky enough to survive until the end, you must unite both powers to defeat the death king.
